dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Well? Sinclair? Were you able to find an answer in your heart’s path?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Ahaha, don’t give me that look.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You’re making me want to kill you.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Ahu… No, no. I should abstain… I can’t let immediate entertainment distract me from the more important things.
Sinclair, the only way to retrieve a Golden Bough that’s begun to resonate is…
Even if it weren’t for our mission…
I’d still tear that bitch to pieces… and drink up her remains.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Kuhuu… Oh, Sinclair…! When did you learn to act so tough? That’s not like you at all… What a riot… Pfft.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Still… Well, I guess you’ve made some friends since then.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You won’t run away this time, will you?
